title: G4 X-Play - 2009.02.24 [DSR.XviD - NoDemand]
description:
G4 - TV That's Plugged In
X-Play - 2009.02.24

Mad Dawn

In this episode of X-Play, Adam and Morgan fire up their PCs to review Dawn of War 2 then go All Access with the new game Mad World. Next, we tackle Left 4 Dead as Tsquared blesses us with some of his Pro Tips, get the scoop on the voice acting in Resident Evil 5 and find out the best PSN Network games in The Download. Plus, The Feed: Gaming Edition, X-Play Recommends and more!
